name: So Long, Mr Spicecake
description:
A de-make of the scene from The Secret Of Monkey Island where Guybrush is dumped underwater tied to the Idol Of Many Hands. 

It's very short and not 100% loyal to the original but I did the best I could with 1024 compressed characters \o/.

Made for Pico 1k Jam 2022 - I highly recommend checking out the other entries! And as always, thanks to Liquidream for running the jam.
